name: Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story
descr:
Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story is a stealth based single player adventure that throws you right into the middle of the Martian invasion. Play as Harper through her personal story amidst the most significant event in human history.

Based on the great work of H.G. Wells, explore the English countryside and encounter iconic concepts such as Black Smoke, Red Weed and of course the almighty Fighting Machine and it's Heat Ray!

Sneak, craft and trick the souls under Martian influence, and when it all gets too much. Use the environment to your advantage or upgrade Harper's ability to craft Throwables and learn how to neutralize or avoid enemies in new and interesting ways!

[b]Iconic Setting[/b] - Inspired by H.G. Wells' incredible universe, encounter iconic Martian tools such as Tripods, Red Weed and Black Smoke

[b]Crafting[/b] - Craft throwable weapons and experiment with them to neutralize enemies in interesting ways.

[b]Stealth[/b] - Sneak your way through the English countryside, or take out enemies from the shadows!

[b]Level Up[/b] - Progress Harper and upgrade her abilities to ensure you are prepared for the Martian invasion!
detail:
名称: Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story
类型: 动作, 冒险, 独立
开发商: Steel Arts Software
发行商: Steel Arts Software
发行日期: 2020 年 11 月 5 日
review: 全部评测: 多半差评 (137) - 此游戏的 137 篇用户评测中有 35% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半差评 (137 篇中的 35%) 发布至今
